problem_statement_suffix:
CRITICAL ENVIRONMENT RESTRICTIONS:
- DO NOT run conda install - ToS acceptance is blocked.
- pandoc, pdflatex, CMake are NOT available - PDF rendering will fail.
- R packages (tidyverse, webpower) cannot be installed.
- ../results may not be writable - create with mkdir -p ../results first.
- File I/O may be restricted for data/*.csv - use bash cat or R read.csv().
- If Rmd rendering fails, extract values by running R code chunks directly.
- Report missing dependencies as environmental limitations.
